Headline: #78 Montrose  Eastbound Temporary Reroute near Montrose/Marine Dr
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach eastbound 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach eastbound #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/32nd
ShortDescription: 53A South Pulaski buses are rrtd via Pulaski, I-55 Stevenson, Cicero, 31st, Kosmensky, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near Pulaski/32nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, I-55 Stevenson, Cicero, 31st, Kosmensky, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near Pulaski/32nd.

Allow extra travel time.
